text: adhkuruu yawm alhashr aldhy yuhshar allah fih al'awalin walakhryn, dhlk alyawm aldhy yazhar fih alghubn waltfawt bayn alkhlq, fyghbn almuminun alkufaar walfasqyn: fahl al'iiman yadkhulun aljanat birahmat allh, wa'ahl alkufr yadkhulun alnaar bedl allh. waman yumin biallah wayaemal btaeth, ymh eanh dhnwbh, wayudkhilh janaat tajri min taht qswrha alanhar, khalidin fiha abdana, dhlk alkhulud fi aljanaat hu alfawz aleazim aldhy la fawz bedh
